channel.title: Simple - a very simple, basic COBOL program on dscobol
channel.description: Recent content in Simple - a very simple, basic COBOL program on dscobol

item.title: COBOL - SIMPLE
item.description:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. SMALLESTPROGRAM.
       ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
       DATA DIVISION.
       FILE SECTION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       MAIN-PROCEDURE.
           DISPLAY 'THIS IS DSCOBOL ON MVS-TK5'.
           STOP RUN.

item.title: JCL - Simple
item.description:
//DSCOBOL1 JOB 1,
//         CLASS=A,
//         MSGCLASS=H,
//         REGION=8M,TIME=1440,
//         MSGLEVEL=(1,1)
//*
//SIMPLE   EXEC COBUCG,
//         PARM.COB='FLAGW,LOAD,SUPMAP,SIZE=2048K,BUF=1024K'
//COB.SYSPUNCH DD DUMMY
//COB.SYSIN    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=&SYSUID..BASE.COBOL(SIMPLE)
//COB.SYSLIB   DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYS1.COBLIB
//GO.SYSOUT    DD SYSOUT=*
